content.body: maybe a more descriptive name would've been [[DeltaDays]]
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: maybe a more descriptive name would've been [[DeltaDays]]

content.body: i don't have anything against [[Days]], just didn't understand why
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: i don't have anything against [[Days]], just didn't understand why

content.body: I can give a more concrete example, maybe
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I can give a more concrete example, maybe

content.body: when you take the difference between two PlainDateTimes, you get the difference between the date parts from the calendar, then you need to take the difference between the time parts ([DifferenceTime](https://tc39.es/proposal-temporal/#sec-temporal-differencetime)). the time difference might be negative or wrap around 24h, so the [[Days]] field indicates that you need to adjust your date difference accordingly
